meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent2: Oh jeez, I forgot my keys again.
meanings.sent3: Jeez, I can't believe I fell for that prank.
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me jump, jeez!
meanings.sent5: Jeez, the loud noise caught me off guard.

meanings.definition: Used as a mild expression of surprise or irritation.
meanings.sent2: Jeez, why is it so hot today?
meanings.sent3: Jeez, I keep forgetting to water the plants.
meanings.sent4: The traffic was a nightmare, jeez!
meanings.sent5: Jeez, the long line at the store was frustrating.
